name: ICU Nurse
description:
GAMEPLAY: 

You are a critical care nurse looking after a very unwell patient. 

Keep an eye on the vitals monitor, make sure you manage your time well, and make sure your patient stays alive. 

It's a hard job being a nurse, but just how hard is it?

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

WORK-IN-PROGRESS:

Final Year project for my Computer Science degree. 

This is an initial build to start playtesting and tackling issues early according to feedback. 

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

FEEDBACK: If you could spare a minute, please consider leaving a comment answering the following questions:

- Would you say that this is a serious game? Or purely an entertaining game? 
- Do you feel that this could be an educational game?
- What did you like about this game? 
- What would you change about this game? 
- What was your least favorite thing?
- Who do you think would want to play this game?

Alternatively, this survey contains the same questions if you don't want to share in the comments section:
https://xlk6upbxj7o.typeform.com/to/smKN2N2s
